data.title: Rotate the square
data.statement: A character square is given to you, where all characters are split by a space and you have to rotate the square to the right or the left with the string [[O]] which contains multiple directions format like "right;left;left".

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
4
right;right;right
p q r f
l l p d
d q r f
c a c a
testCases.testOut:
f d f a
r p r c
q l q a
p l d c

testCases.title: Alphanum 7
testCases.testIn:
7
left;right;left;right;left;right;left;right;left;right;left
a b c d e f g
h i j k l m n
o p q r s t u
v w x y z 0 1
2 3 4 5 6 a b
c d e f g h i
k l m n o p q
testCases.testOut:
g n u 1 b i q
f m t 0 a h p
e l s z 6 g o
d k r y 5 f n
c j q x 4 e m
b i p w 3 d l
a h o v 2 c k

data.stubGenerator:
read S:int
read O:string(1024)
loop S read line:string(1024)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> [[S]] Size of the square
<<Line 2 :>> [[O]] Multiple directions {{right}} or {{left}} separated by {{;}}
<<Next [[S]] lines :>> A line of the initial square
data.outputDescription: The final square which was rotated in each direction.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A character square is given to you, where all characters are split by a space and you have to rotate the square to the right or the left with the string O which contains multiple directions format like "right;left;left".
Input
Line 1 : S Size of the square
Line 2 : O Multiple directions right or left separated by ;
Next S lines : A line of the initial square
Output
The final square which was rotated in each direction.
Constraints
2 ≤ S ≤ 99
Example
Input
2
left
a b
c d
Output
b d
a c
